hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: What do you do for a living? ddf skincare reviews There are, as always, a few caveats to be mindful of (and the developer makes no bones about the fact this is an experimental app). It’s better to run the ActiveNotifications on devices that have AMOLED displays as only certain parts of your screen get lit up — running the app on the Nexus 4 caused the entire screen to light up, which won’t do your batteries many favors. ActiveNotifications can also only show one notification type at a time: you’ll see a Gmail icon for instance, but not a Facebook icon even if the messages hit your phone at the same time. Given the blistering pace of updates being pushed out though, it shouldn’t be long before the gap between ActiveNotifications and the real deal closes dramatically.
